parameters.name: Ipv4GatewayId
parameters.description: The ID of the IPv4 gateway.

parameters.name: Ipv4GatewayName
parameters.description:
The name of the IPv4 gateway.

The name must be 1 to 128 characters in length, and cannot start with `http://` or `https://`.

parameters.name: MaxResults
parameters.description: The number of entries to return on each page. Valid values: **1** to **100**. Default value: **10**.

parameters.name: NextToken
parameters.description:
The token that is used for the next query. Valid values:

*   If this is your first query and no next queries are to be sent, ignore this parameter.
*   If a next query is to be sent, set the value to the value of NextToken that is returned from the last call.

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description:
The ID of the region where the IPv4 gateways to be queried are deployed.

You can call the [DescribeRegions](~~36063~~) operation to query the most recent region list.

parameters.name: ResourceGroupId
parameters.description: The ID of the resource group to which the IPv4 gateway belongs.

parameters.name: VpcId
parameters.description: The ID of the virtual private cloud (VPC) with which the IPv4 gateway is associated.
